insert into golden_file (createby, createtime, deleted, description, displayno, fileCount, fjName, fjUrl, folderCount, `name`, parentid, `size`, `type`) values (#{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{filecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fjname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fjurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foldercount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update golden_file set createby = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displayno = #{displayno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fileCount = #{filecount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fjName = #{fjname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fjUrl = #{fjurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, folderCount = #{foldercount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `size` = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, createby, createtime, deleted, description, displayno, fileCount, fjName, fjUrl, folderCount, `name`, parentid, `size`, `type` from golden_file where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
